channel.title: Help
channel.description: Hello.My name is Sledgehammuh,as you already probably know and I have a really stupid question.Do I need a game with the famous 'Source engine' since I downloaded Black mesa but I'm not certain where to start it from since there isn't a launcher to be found anywhere.I have steam by the way and I cant find it in my library.So...yeah.If anyone has a solution please help me out since I'm really excited to see the source engine in Half life 1,and I'll be disappointed if I can't play it.Thanks in advance !

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: yrr
item.description:
I refer you to this page: https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/Installation_Manual

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: Sledgehammuh
item.description:
Hello.My name is Sledgehammuh,as you already probably know and I have a really stupid question.Do I need a game with the famous ‘Source engine’ since I downloaded Black mesa but I’m not certain where to start it from since there isn’t a launcher to be found anywhere.I have steam by the way and I cant find it in my library.So…yeah.If anyone has a solution please help me out since I’m really excited to see the source engine in Half life 1,and I’ll be disappointed if I can’t play it.Thanks in advance !

Read full topic
